sentences.en: a crash victim
sentences.cn: 车祸受害者

sentences.en: A large branch came crashing down .
sentences.cn: 一根大树枝啪啦一声掉落下来。

sentences.en: A man in a crash helmet was mounting a motorbike.
sentences.cn: 一位戴头盔的男子正跨上摩托车。

sentences.en: Forty-one people were killed in the plane crash.
sentences.cn: 这次飞机失事有41人遇难。

sentences.en: He arrives in his biplane and crash lands it in a tree.
sentences.cn: 他驾驶双翼飞机到达，在一棵树上紧急降落。

sentences.en: He hit the metal steps with a ringing crash.
sentences.cn: 只听他咣当一声，摔在了金属台阶上。

sentences.en: He pulled on a battered old crash helmet with a scratched visor.
sentences.cn: 他戴上了一顶破旧的防护头盔，上面的面罩已有划痕。

sentences.en: Her voice was drowned out by a loud crash.
sentences.cn: 她的声音被一声响亮的撞击声所淹没。

sentences.en: His plane made a crash-landing during a sandstorm yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天他的飞机在沙尘暴中紧急降落。

sentences.en: I just want to crash out on the sofa.
sentences.cn: 我只想在沙发上睡会儿。

sentences.en: My words were lost as the walls above us crashed down, filling the cellar with brick dust.
sentences.cn: 随着上面的墙体轰隆一声倒塌下来，地窖里充满砖灰，我吓得说不出话来。

sentences.en: Officials said there were no survivors of the plane crash.
sentences.cn: 官方说这次飞机失事无一人生还。

sentences.en: Poor chap— he was killed in an air crash.
sentences.cn: 不幸的家伙，他死于空难。

sentences.en: The aircraft's wings were sheared off in the crash.
sentences.cn: 机翼在坠机时断裂了。

sentences.en: The car shattered into a thousand burning pieces in a 200mph crash.
sentences.cn: 汽车在时速为200英里时发生撞车，炸成了数以千计燃烧的碎片。

sentences.en: The crash was a direct result of inadequate navigational aids.
sentences.cn: 坠机是导航不力的直接后果。

sentences.en: The door swung inwards to crash against a chest of drawers behind it.
sentences.cn: 门摆向里面，砰的一声猛力撞上了门后的五斗橱。

sentences.en: The front door closed with a crash behind him.
sentences.cn: 前门在他身后砰的一声关上了。

sentences.en: The jet crashed after take-off.
sentences.cn: 这架喷气式飞机起飞后就坠毁了。

sentences.en: The next moment there was an almighty crash.
sentences.cn: 接着发生了剧烈的撞击。

sentences.en: The plates went crashing to the ground.
sentences.cn: 盘子哗啦一声摔落到地上。

sentences.en: Waterfalls crash and tumble over rocks.
sentences.cn: 瀑布飞流直溅，冲刷着岩石。

sentences.en: We watched the waves crashing against the rocks.
sentences.cn: 我们看着海浪哗啦哗啦地冲击岩石。

words.tran_cn: 碰撞；[航]坠毁；闯；突然倒台

phrases.tran_cn: (北美，非正式)悲痛欲绝；一败涂地
安全帽；（飞行员，摩托车驾驶员等的）防撞头盔
股市崩盘；股市行情暴跌

trans.tran_cn: 撞车，碰撞（声）， 暴跌，破产
trans.tran_en: an accident in which a vehicle violently hits something else
to have an accident in a car, plane etc by violently hitting something else

trans.tran_cn: （使）碰撞，撞毁，暴跌，破产，（计算机）崩溃，瘫痪，入睡
trans.tran_en: to make a sudden loud noise
to have an accident in a car, plane etc by violently hitting something else

trans.tran_cn: 碰撞，倒下，坠落；发出撞击声；垮台，破产
trans.tran_en: to have an accident in a car, plane etc by violently hitting something else

trans.tran_cn: 撞击， 砸碎； 冲， 闯
trans.tran_en: to hit something or someone extremely hard while moving, in a way that causes a lot of damage or makes a lot of noise
to have an accident in a car, plane etc by violently hitting something else
